message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's a great deal and I'm sure you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $120 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $150.  This is a great price for this product, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $150, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still not able to go lower than $140. This is a fair price for this product, and I believe it's a good value for you.  Let me know if you're able to meet me there.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $135?

Bob, I'm really trying to work with you here, but I can't go any lower than $145. This is a very good deal for you, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the product.  Let me know if you're able to meet me at this price.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $137.50?
